verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> the wall <S%H2346><s%> was rebuilt <S%H1129><s%> and I had set <S%H5975><s%> up the doors, <S%H1817><s%> and the gatekeepers <S%H7778><s%> and the singers <S%H7891><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were appointed, <S%H6485><s%>

that I put <S%H6680><s%> Hanani <S%H2607><s%> my brother, <S%H251><s%> and Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the commander <S%H8269><s%> of the fortress, <S%H1002><s%> in charge <S%H5921><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> for he was a faithful <S%H571><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and feared <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H430><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> many. <S%H7227><s%>

Then I said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Do not let the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> be opened <S%H6605><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> is hot, <S%H2552><s%> and while <S%H5704><s%> they are standing <S%H5975><s%> [guard,] let them shut <S%H1479><s%> and bolt <S%H270><s%> the doors. <S%H1817><s%> Also appoint <S%H5975><s%> guards <S%H4931><s%> from the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> each <S%H376><s%> at his post, <S%H4929><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> in front <S%H5048><s%> of his own house. <S%H1004><s%>"

Now the city <S%H5892><s%> was large <S%H7342><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and spacious, <S%H1419><s%> but the people <S%H5971><s%> in it were few <S%H4592><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> were not built. <S%H1129><s%>

Then my God <S%H430><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> it into my heart <S%H3820><s%> to assemble <S%H6908><s%> the nobles, <S%H2715><s%> the officials, <S%H5461><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> to be enrolled <S%H3187><s%> by genealogies. <S%H3187><s%> Then I found <S%H4672><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%> of the genealogy <S%H3188><s%> of those who came <S%H5927><s%> up first <S%H7223><s%> in which I found <S%H4672><s%> the following record: <S%H3789><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the people <S%H1121><s%> of the province <S%H4082><s%> who came <S%H5927><s%> up from the captivity <S%H7628><s%> of the exiles <S%H1473><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had carried <S%H1540><s%> away, <S%H1540><s%> and who returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and Judah, <S%H3063><s%> each <S%H376><s%> to his city, <S%H5892><s%>

who came <S%H935><s%> with Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> Jeshua, <S%H3091><s%> Nehemiah, <S%H5166><s%> Azariah, <S%H5838><s%> Raamiah, <S%H7485><s%> Nahamani, <S%H5167><s%> Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> Bilshan, <S%H1114><s%> Mispereth, <S%H4559><s%> Bigvai, <S%H902><s%> Nehum, <S%H5149><s%> Baanah. <S%H1196><s%> The number <S%H4557><s%> of men <S%H376><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Parosh, <S%H6551><s%> 2172;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah, <S%H8203><s%> 372;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Arah, <S%H733><s%> 652;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pahath-moab of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3091><s%> and Joab, <S%H3097><s%> 2818;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elam, <S%H9405><s%> 1254;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zattu, <S%H2240><s%> 845;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccai, <S%H2140><s%> 760;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Binnui, <S%H1131><s%> 648;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bebai, <S%H893><s%> 628;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azgad, <S%H5803><s%> 2322;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adonikam, <S%H140><s%> 667;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bigvai, <S%H902><s%> 2067;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adin, <S%H5720><s%> 655;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ater, <S%H333><s%> of Hezekiah, <S%H2396><s%> 98 <S%H8673><s%>; <S%H8083><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hashum, <S%H2828><s%> 328;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bezai, <S%H1209><s%> 324;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hariph, <S%H2756><s%> 112;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%> and Netophah, <S%H5199><s%> 188;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Anathoth, <S%H6068><s%> 128;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Beth-azmaveth, <S%H42><s%> <S%H705><s%> 8147;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Kiriath-jearim, Chephirah, <S%H3716><s%> and Beeroth, <S%H881><s%> 743;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Geba, <S%H1387><s%> 621;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Michmas, <S%H4363><s%> 122;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Bethel <S%H1008><s%> and Ai, <S%H5857><s%> 123;
the men <S%H376><s%> of the other <S%H312><s%> Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> 52 <S%H2572><s%> 8147;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the other <S%H312><s%> Elam, <S%H9405><s%> 1254;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harim, <S%H2766><s%> 320;
the men <S%H1121><s%> of Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> 345;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lod, <S%H3850><s%> Hadid, <S%H2307><s%> and Ono, <S%H207><s%> 721;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Senaah, <S%H5570><s%> 3930.
The priests: <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jeshua, <S%H3091><s%> 973;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Immer, <S%H564><s%> 1052;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pashhur, <S%H6583><s%> 1247;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harim, <S%H2766><s%> 1017.
The Levites: <S%H3881><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua, <S%H3091><s%> of Kadmiel, <S%H6934><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hodevah, <S%H1937><s%> 74. <S%H7657><s%> <S%H702><s%>
The singers: <S%H7891><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph, <S%H623><s%> 148.

The gatekeepers: <S%H7778><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shallum, <S%H7967><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ater, <S%H333><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Talmon, <S%H2929><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Akkub, <S%H6126><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hatita, <S%H2410><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shobai, <S%H7630><s%> 138.
The temple <S%H5411><s%> servants: <S%H5411><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ziha, <S%H6727><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hasupha, <S%H2817><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Tabbaoth, <S%H2884><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Keros, <S%H7026><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sia, <S%H5517><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Padon, <S%H6303><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lebana, <S%H3838><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hagaba, <S%H2286><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shalmai, <S%H8014><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hanan, <S%H2605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Giddel, <S%H1435><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gahar, <S%H1515><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reaiah, <S%H7211><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rezin, <S%H7526><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nekoda, <S%H5353><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gazzam, <S%H1502><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzza, <S%H5798><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Paseah, <S%H6454><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Besai, <S%H1153><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Meunim, <S%H4586><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nephushesim, <S%H5304><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bakbuk, <S%H1227><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hakupha, <S%H2709><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harhur, <S%H2744><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bazlith, <S%H1213><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mehida, <S%H4240><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harsha, <S%H2797><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Barkos, <S%H1302><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Temah, <S%H8547><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Neziah, <S%H5335><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hatipha. <S%H2412><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Solomon's servants: <S%H5650><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sotai, <S%H5479><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sophereth, <S%H5618><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perida, <S%H6514><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jaala, <S%H3279><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Darkon, <S%H1874><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Giddel, <S%H1435><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah, <S%H8203><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hattil, <S%H2411><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pochereth-hazzebaim, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Amon. <S%H526><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants <S%H5411><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Solomon's servants <S%H5650><s%> [were] 392.

And these <S%H428><s%> [were] they who came <S%H5927><s%> up from Tel-melah, Tel-harsha, Cherub, <S%H3743><s%> Addon, <S%H114><s%> and Immer; <S%H564><s%> but they could <S%H3201><s%> not show <S%H5046><s%> their fathers' houses <S%H1004><s%> or their descendants, <S%H2233><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> they were of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Delaiah, <S%H1806><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nekoda, <S%H5353><s%> 642.

And of the priests: <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hobaiah, <S%H2252><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hakkoz, <S%H6976><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Barzillai, <S%H1271><s%> who <S%H834><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Barzillai, <S%H1271><s%> the Gileadite, <S%H1569><s%> and was named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> them.

These <S%H428><s%> searched <S%H1245><s%> [among] their ancestral <S%H3187><s%> registration, <S%H3791><s%> <S%H3187><s%> but it could not be located; <S%H4672><s%> therefore they were considered unclean <S%H1351><s%> [and excluded] from the priesthood. <S%H3550><s%>

And the governor <S%H8660><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them that they should not eat <S%H398><s%> from the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> things <S%H6944><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> a priest <S%H3548><s%> arose <S%H5975><s%> with Urim <S%H224><s%> and Thummim. <S%H8550><s%>
The whole <S%H3605><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%> together <S%H259><s%> [was] 42360,

besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> their male <S%H5650><s%> and their female <S%H519><s%> servants, <S%H5650><s%> <S%H519><s%> of whom <S%H428><s%> [there were] 7337; and they had <S%H245><s%> male and female singers. <S%H7891><s%>
Their horses <S%H5483><s%> were 736; their mules, <S%H6505><s%> 245;
[their] camels, <S%H1581><s%> 435; [their] donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> 6720.

And some <S%H4480><s%> from among the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households] gave <S%H5414><s%> to the work. <S%H4399><s%> The governor <S%H8660><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to the treasury <S%H214><s%> 1000 gold <S%H2091><s%> drachmas, <S%H1871><s%> 50 <S%H2572><s%> basins, <S%H4219><s%> 530 priests' garments. <S%H3801><s%>

And some <S%H4480><s%> of the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households] gave <S%H5414><s%> into the treasury <S%H214><s%> of the work <S%H4399><s%> 20000 gold <S%H2091><s%> drachmas, <S%H1871><s%> and 2200 silver <S%H3701><s%> minas. <S%H4488><s%>

And that which <S%H834><s%> the rest <S%H7611><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> was 20000 gold <S%H2091><s%> drachmas <S%H1871><s%> and 2000 silver <S%H3701><s%> minas, <S%H4488><s%> and 67 <S%H8346><s%> <S%H7651><s%> priests' garments. <S%H3801><s%>

Now the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> the gatekeepers, <S%H7778><s%> the singers, <S%H7891><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants, <S%H5411><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in their cities. <S%H5892><s%> And when the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> came, <S%H5060><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> [were] in their cities. <S%H5892><s%>
